item.description:
Ladies, come join me for a different kind of workout! We’ll begin with a fun cardio dance warm-up that includes belly dance, Latin dance and hip hop. Next, we’ll use a chair, ball and resistance bands to tone, tighten and build lean muscle. We’ll finish up really breaking a sweat learning and rehearsing a fun and flirty chair routine! You’ll actually have some fun while getting in shape!

At Bridget's Dance Studio you won't have to deal with the overcrowded gym floor or expensive membership fees. Just sign up at www.bridgetsdancestudio.com the day before you'd like to take a class.

*New Year special $7 a class or get one free with a ten pack for only $60!*

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Strip Fit
